official_title: A bill to provide increases in certain annuities payable under chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides cost of living increases in civil service retirement annuities payable to Federal employees and officials and their survivors equal to any increase under title II of the Social Security Act. Provides that an annuity payable from the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund to a former employee or Member, which is based on a separation occurring prior to October 20, 1969, is increased by $240. Provides that, in lieu of such increase, an annuity payable from the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund to the surviving spouse of an employee, Member, or annuitant, which is based on a separation occurring prior to October 20, 1969, shall be increased by $132.

titles.title: A bill to provide increases in certain annuities payable under chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, and for other purposes.
